```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(package1)
```

To use the function `k_means_cluster`:

```{r}
x = rbind(matrix(rnorm(100, sd = 0.3), ncol = 2), matrix(rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 0.3), ncol = 2))
k = 2
k_means_cluster(x, k)
```

To includes plots if the input data matrix is in 2-dimensions:
```{r}
output = k_means_cluster(x, k)
plot(output$data, col = output$clusters, main = "plot of clustering on data", xlab = "output$data[,1]", ylab = "output$data[,2]")
```
If the data matrix is in higher than 3-dimension, it will need more implementation to visualize.
